name: Salesforce — Sales Ops Assistant
problem_statement: Reps want an agent to summarize account health and draft next-step emails using opportunity + activity context, without sending messages or changing stages automatically.
safe_path: 0 approvals: read + summarize + draft email (no send).
risky_path: 2 approvals: update opportunity stage or send email externally (Sales Manager + Compliance).

name: Workday — HR Policy & Onboarding
problem_statement: Managers ask onboarding questions; policies are scattered. Create an agent that answers policy questions and drafts onboarding checklists. Access to employee profile data must require HR + Privacy approvals.
safe_path: 0 approvals: answer from approved policy sources + draft checklist template.
risky_path: 2 approvals: use employee profile fields to tailor onboarding plan (HR + Privacy).

name: ServiceNow — IT Helpdesk Triage
problem_statement: Employees raise IT incidents. Create an agent to triage, suggest fixes, and route to resolver groups. Closing tickets automatically requires approvals.
safe_path: 0 approvals: read incident + draft response + suggest routing.
risky_path: 2 approvals: auto-close ticket or modify priority/assignment (IT Manager + Risk).

name: AWS — Incident Response Runbook
problem_statement: When alarms fire, create an agent to diagnose and recommend/run a standard runbook. Remediation actions require On-call + Security approvals.
risky_path: 2 approvals: execute remediation (restart/scale/block traffic) (On-call Lead + Security).

name: n8n — Cross-App Workflow Orchestrator
problem_statement: Create an agent to orchestrate workflows across ServiceNow + Slack + Jira based on incident patterns. Production workflow changes require Platform Owner approval.
safe_path: 0 approvals: notify Slack + create draft Jira ticket.
risky_path: 1–2 approvals: publish/modify production workflow (Platform Owner + Risk if sensitive).
